faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Lalabel, your data security and using the application.

cta.title: Another question?
cta.description: Feel free to contact us at contact@lalabel.app if you can't find the answer to your question.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Absolutely! Your data is processed 100% locally in your browser. No files are sent to our servers - all processing is done directly on your device. Your addresses and orders remain entirely private and secure.

files.question: What do you do with my import files?
files.answer: Nothing at all! Your CSV/TSV files never leave your browser. They are processed locally to extract addresses, then immediately deleted from memory. We do not store, backup or transmit any of your files or personal data.

account.question: Why do I need to create an account?
account.answer: The account only allows us to count the number of active users to improve the service. We only collect your email - no commercial data, no customer addresses, no files are linked to your account.

platforms.question: Which platforms are supported?
platforms.answer: Lalabel automatically supports Amazon Seller Central, Shopify, eBay, as well as all generic CSV files. Our system automatically detects your file format and extracts the right address columns. You can also import any CSV with address columns.

formats.question: What print formats are available?
formats.answer: With the free plan, you have access to the 10-label adhesive format and CSV export. The Premium plan unlocks all formats: 14, 16 and 21 labels per page, label rolls for thermal printers, standard and compact A4 formats. All formats include real-time preview.

waste.question: How can I avoid wasting label sheets?
waste.answer: With the Premium plan, you have access to anti-waste mode which allows you to reuse partially used sheets. If you've already removed 3 labels from a sheet, simply select the offset so printing starts from the 4th position. Perfect for saving paper and money!

pricing.question: How does the freemium model work?
pricing.answer: Lalabel offers you up to 5 free labels per print job. Perfect for small shipments. If you need more, our Premium plan starting at â‚¬4/month gives you unlimited labels with priority support.

fileAnalysis.helpImprove: Help us improve our recognition system by sending us your file:
fileAnalysis.privacy: Your data will be used solely to improve the tool (no permanent storage, no commercial use).
fileAnalysis.emailSubject: [Lalabel] File with no detected addresses - Improvement request
fileAnalysis.emailBody:
Hello,

I tried to import a file on Lalabel but no addresses were detected.

File information:
- Platform type (Amazon, Shopify, eBay, other): 
- File format (CSV, TSV, TXT): 
- Approximate number of lines: 
- Content description: 

I'm attaching the file to help you improve the recognition system.

ðŸ”’ PRIVACY:
I understand that this file will be used solely to improve the Lalabel tool and analyze unrecognized formats. The data will not be stored permanently, used for commercial purposes, or shared with third parties. You will keep me informed of improvements made thanks to my help.

Thank you for developing such a useful tool for online sellers!

Best regards

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the website located at lalabel.app (the "Website"), provided by Lalabel ("we," "our," or "us"). By accessing the Website, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use Lalabel.

refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.content: Lalabel comes with a 14-day money-back guarantee. If you are not satisfied, you may request a refund within 14 days of purchase by contacting us at contact@lalabel.app

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, code, and materials provided on the Website and in the software are owned by Lalabel and protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce or distribute them without permission.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The Software is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. We do not guarantee that it will be error-free or meet your specific requirements.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Lalabel shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of the Software or Website.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by French law.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions, contact us at

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.intro: We want you to feel confident when purchasing Lalabel.

guarantee.title: 14-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.point1: You may request a full refund within 14 days of purchase if you are not satisfied.
guarantee.point2: Refund requests must be sent to contact@lalabel.app with your order details.
guarantee.point3: Refunds will be issued to your original payment method.
guarantee.point4: After 14 days, all sales are final.
guarantee.point5: This policy does not affect your legal rights under applicable consumer protection laws.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions about refunds, please email us at

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We respect your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we handle your data when you use our website and software.

purchase.title: Purchase Information
purchase.content: When you purchase Lalabel, our payment processor (Dodo Payments or equivalent) collects your name, email address, and payment information. We do not store your payment data.

analytics.title: Analytics and Cookies
analytics.content: We may use basic analytics tools to understand website usage.

informationWeDoNotCollect.title: Information We Do Not Collect
informationWeDoNotCollect.content: Lalabel processes your TXT/CSV files entirely locally in your browser. We do not upload, store, or access them.

howWeUseInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInformation.updates: To communicate important updates or product improvements.

yourChoices.title: Your Choices
yourChoices.content: You can request deletion of your personal data or unsubscribe from communications by contacting us.

security.title: Security
security.content: We take reasonable steps to protect your data, although no method is 100% secure.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions, contact us at
